name: Poink-and-Clink: A point & click framework for Ink
author: Avery Hiebert
descr: Poink-and-Clink ("Poink" for short) is a drop-in replacement for the default web export template in Inky, adding support for simple point & click game functionality. Perfect for simple 2D point & click games, especially if you're doing the art in Aseprite (there's an export script!)
